metadata.title: CVE-2020-8648 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel through 5.5.2in the n_tty_receive_buf_common function in drivers/tty/n_tty.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8648` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-21-generic - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-5.4.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-21-generic - 5.4.0-21.25
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-21-lowlatency - 5.4.0-21.25
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1006-kvm - 5.4.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1007-aws - 5.4.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1008-azure - 5.4.0-1008.8
No subscription required
